/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. On the right side of the road, there's a bus stop waiting for passengers. A white SUV is parked on the left side of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the cityscape. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, filled with life and activity.
